text: ane temani komana loko takarara karava lagya, temane kahyum sum tame allaha vise mari sathe vivada karo cho, jo ke tene (allaha'e) mane satya margadarsana api didhum che ane hum te vastu'othi, jene tame allaha sathe bhagidara theravo cho, nathi darato, ham jo maro palanahara ja ko'i adesa apava icche, maro palanahara dareka babatanum jnana dharave che, sum tame to pana vicarata nathi
